reviews.review:
Очень хорошая игра. Можно взять содержимое мусорного ведра и скушать его. Совсем как в реальной жизни

真想一直在沙滩上看伊丽莎白跳舞。
Best FPS with no chain u have ever heard.(realtalk:too smart for a fps; ending made me cry like a lil bitch)

Fan de Rapture, je n’ai personnellement pas été séduit par Columbia, la cité dans les nuages.
De plus remplacer les noms "ADAM " et "EVE " ou encore "Plasmides" juste histoire de dire aux joueurs Bioshock « hey vous avez vu cette fois si on n’a pas fait pareil » alors que sur le fond c’est la même chose m’a dérangé. Coté background le joueur reste cependant toujours aussi impliqué.

Mais bon, j’ai commencé par les éléments dépréciatifs, voilà pourquoi je recommande ce jeu :
Cette fois si il contrôle à nouveau un être humain, envoyé sur Columbia pour sauver une femme du nom d’Elizabeth qu’il, de la même façon que Ashley dans Resident Evil IV, devra se coltiner tout le long du jeu (par chance non seulement elle ne peut pas se faire tuer en combat mais en plus elle possède des pouvoirs pouvant être utiles et, comme Canigou dans Fallout, trouve des trousses de soins (argueugueugueu.……) Et des munitions ! La rendant TRES appréciable.
Même si de mon avis purement subjectif je préfère Rapture à Colombia, au final les différents décors, éléments de jeu et éléments scénaristiques satisferont ceux ayant appréciés toute la mythologie Bioshock des deux premiers jeux et sont, au final, en toute objectivité : bien au-dessus.
Beaucoup de beaux screenshot sont à faire.

Graphismes, maniabilité et IA, c’est du Bioshock, les trois ne sont pas parfaits mais très corrects pour ce type de jeu :
Ce jeu est un excellent FPS scénarisé.


De plus, possédant les dlc permettant de retourner en Rapture à travers les yeux de Booker, accompagné d’Elizabeth, cette expérience additionnelle m’a fait passer ce Bioshock de moins apprécié à plus apprécié de la série.

Je recommande fortement ce jeu à tout fans et non connaisseurs de la série, avec dlc ou non.

"Bon... sa fait longtemps que j'ai ce jeu mais...jamais j'aurais cru faire une évaluation là-dessus. Pour commencer la série Bioshock est pour moi la révélation de ma vie. Ce monde si claustrophobe et à la fois triste. Puis, Bioshock Infinite fit son apparition (pour moi) en 2014. Je ne sais pas quoi vous dire sur ce jeu. Ce jeu la je pense qu'il finit la série Bioshock. Avec tous les mystères révélaient et tout le reste. Bon je ne vais pas faire un long critique sur ce jeu-là. Je veux juste dire que... Bioshock...c'est la meilleure série du jeu vidéo au monde. Voilà, salut."

- Votre plus grand fan
A game with a very deep story a nice plot twist and generally well designed 10/10 ign ''not so much water this time''
THE GRATEST GAME OF ALL TIME

[h1]简要游玩体验[/h1][spoiler]因为直接启了三代所以这里只简单说说三代，不与前代联系[/spoiler]
流程主线里的对于剧情说明补充的部分大部分是通过游戏里的对话完成，玩这个游戏要最好不要错过所有中文释义，毕竟大部分剧情只通过最终话的一段动画来点开让人实在有点信息量过大而不能理解状况
[u]以下内容涉及剧透请未游玩玩家规避[/u]

我重复看了几遍主体和dlc的结尾动画才[strike]勉强[/strike]对剧情有些理解，大致上是【布克】于伤膝河战役后将女儿【安娜】拿去抵押【债务】，这个【债务】有可能是【赌债】，虽然游戏里【布克】自己是这么说的但我不知道是不是他对自己的自嘲，在自己的【事务所】里宅了20年来后悔，这时候【卢托斯】兄妹来找他给予他和女儿重逢的机会，然而很不幸的【布克】将其与自己的回忆重合制造了自己仍背负【债务】的记忆，于是这就是我们玩家开始的一幕，之后的故事我们都知道了，【伊丽莎白】让【布克】意识到自己就是【康姆斯托克】，【伊丽莎白】成功溺死了即将洗礼成【康姆斯托克】的【布克】，但在另一个世界里【布克】并未拒绝洗礼，【布克】无法忍受自己出卖女儿【安娜】的罪恶，并且意识到【安娜】就是【伊丽莎白】时，接受洗礼忘记自己对【伊丽莎白】的罪恶成为【康姆斯托克】，他在成为【先知】后对过去的自己出卖【安娜】抱有罪恶，又因对未来感到迷惑，于是有了7天诞下一女婴，但其实是雇佣了【卢托斯】兄妹，在过去从无能的自己【布克】手里抢下将失去的女儿【安娜】，这之后【安娜】化名【伊丽莎白】在天使楼里遇见了【夜莺】，结果【布克】来到这里带走了【伊丽莎白】，[b]一个完整的循环[/b]。
【伊丽莎白】能看到所有门后的世界，但她只能打开自己的世界，位于过去自己【安娜】时候的世界却是她没有能力改变的，为了探寻另一个谜团她与夜莺间的关系，自己则死在了救助莎拉的途中。
如有错误，方便请指出，不然就等我通了前代再修正评测

Non ho mai giocato ne al primo e ne al secondo della saga(cosa che presto farò),ho voluto comunque provare questo terzo capitolo e l ho finito nell'arco di 3 giorni giocando circa 8 ore al giorno completando quasi tutte le missioni opzionali e gli achievement da quanto mi ha preso. 
PRO: storia e ambientazioni stupende,ti prendono come pochi giochi; motore grafico che gira in tranquillita(grafica fresca,frizzante); un gameplay vasto ed originale che garantisce varie possibilità di completare una situazione di gioco; 
CONTRO: se siete abituati a questi tipi di sparatutto,se avete un po' la mano su questi giochi,la difficoltà vi sembrerà troppo bassa e sarete costretti a giocare il gioco in modalità difficile(e nonostante ciò le difficoltà vere e proprie usciranno solamente a trequarti del gioco).
INFINE: gioco comunque molto longevo,davvero un capolavoro su molti aspetti,consiglio vivamente questo gioco a chiunque,specialmente agli appasionati del genere fantasy sparatutto.
Лучшее, во что я когда-либо играл.
很好玩
画面太棒了，游戏性不错。就是枪只能拿两把，弹药和魔力不是很足，打起来不是很爽，但总体好评！值得入手。结局引人深思
굉장히 정치적이고 종교적인 내용을 담은 갓겜

Game muito bom. Belissimo, com gráficos muito bonitos, bem desenhados e o enredo (quando você entende) é MUITO WOW! O problema é que o enredo na minha percepção não fácil de entender precisando recorrer a algumas sites e vídeos para buscar o entendimento total do game que é muito bom. Vale a pena as quase 14 horas de game.

Sobre a fluidez do game, eu não sei se é miha maquina (eu creio que sim), mas o game está dando muito stutter (engasgando) e minhas configs são 8Gb DDR3 1866, FX 6300 stock e GTX 1060 3Gb.
Mesmo assim não comprometeu muito a jogabilidade. As vezes irrita, mas deu pra jogar de boa na maior parte do tempo.

THIS. GAME. IS. AMAZING! TRULY ONE OF THE BEST GAMES I'VE EVER PLAYED. ANDREW RYAN IS THE BEST VILLAN EVER, AND RAPTURE IS A WONDERFULY DETAILED WORLD. I WOULD SPEND HOURS JUST EXPLORING THE WORLD AND LISTNING TO THE AUDIO LOGS SCATTERED THROUGHOUT THE GAME. While it is classified as a FPS, it is SO MUCH MORE THAN THAT. It has some RPG elements, some pretty heavy themes and ideals in the plot, THE BIGGEST TWIST THAT U WILL NEVER SEE COMING besides BioShock Infinite, and some awesome Horror elements. This game keeps you on the edge of your seat with splicers at every corner, just stoppong and listning for 10 seconds gives you a big shiver, and, obviously, THE BIG DADDY FIGHTS While I think it may be possible to skip them, trust me. IF U EVEN MISS 1 BIG DADDY AND ITS LITTLE SISTER U R SCREWED, AS THIS GAME GETS PRETTY HARD NEAR THE END. So, yeah. THIS GAME IS AMAZING! BUY IT IF U HAVEN'T ALREADY. OR IF U HAVE THE CONSOLE VERSION, GET THE PC VERSION! IT IS THE BETTER ONE, AS THE ACTION GETS MORE FRANTIC AND TENCE WHEN U HAVE TO SWITCH WEAPONS MANUALLY, NOT ON SOME STUPID WEAPON WHEEL. If u can, I'd say get the BioShock Trilogy pack. 3 great games 4 the price of 1! GET THIS GAME
Вам придётся потерпеть геймплей ради всего остального.

An amazing and beautiful game. I've dipped my toes into this game a bit ago and didn't much get into it, and just two days ago decided to try it again. I finished the game in just over one day.

I loved this game. I love the characters, guns, vigors, everything. The idea of being in the sky and riding around on sky-lines were really cool. I'm going to explain the story briefly.

You are Booker DeWitt, an agent who has a job to do. You are tasked to find Elizabeth in the city in the sky, Columbia, in the year 1912.

The ending was really hard-hitting for me, and liked the way it called off the game. Once you complete the game, you unlock 1999 mode, which makes the game significantly more hard.

All in all, Bioshock Infinite is a wonderful experience that you should see for yourself. Buy it now!

La obra de Ken Levine nos muestra una historia alucinante que no puede acabar mejor, con una mecánica de tiroteos algo forzada y una duración más que justa, más tomando en cuenta su más que barato precio. Los temás que nos trata son más que interesantes, y mejora en muchísimas cosas a sus predecesores. El sello de calidad de Levine se nota, es simplemente imprescindible.

9/10

A VERY devisive game. Some thought it was too preachy. Some thought it wasn't preachy enough. Some thought it was politically correct. Some thought it was offensive. I thought it was a great video game. The gameplay is vastly different from the first BioShock. It's run and gun verses the stealth like gameplay of the original. I found I enjoyed both. 

However, it's the story and the atmosphere that keep you coming back to this game. When you first arrive at the city I spent hours just exploring the nooks and crannies of the world. It truly is a wonder to behold.

As for the story itself. Let me just say when I got to the end I actually teared up a bit. Now it may have been the beer I was drinking but it really got me. I won't say much except that I loved the story and thought about it for days afterwards.
Pretty good not as good as the first i would recomend getting it on a sale.

让我知道，你能在这成千上万个宇宙中幸福地活下去，就够了。
至于我，我存不存在，是被淹死在河里也好，是隔着屏幕活在对你而言另外一个世界也好，也都不重要了。
我选择相信一些事情，伊丽莎白。
Un très beau jeu, un univers riche et une histoire qui sort de l'ordinaire. Vraiment bien !

最后章节的剧情大反转让我在玩完这个游戏后还是有点意犹未尽。虽然是几年前的游戏，各种景物的细节和人物的表情还是应有尽有。良好的射击手感打起来真的非常痛快。整体故事的节奏也很恰到好处，只要不总是在为了捡垃圾到处乱转不会觉得很拖沓（说的就是我）。除了在救伊丽莎白的时候失去了自动贩卖机，补给少到爆炸各种死（瞬间意识到伊丽莎白疯狂给子弹的重要性），打的略有点烦躁之外，整个流程没有什么不满意的地方。流程中推荐使用狙击和手铳，充分体验割草快感（除了最后一关请一定不要使用狙）。不说了，我要去找剧情解析了。

Obra maestra... una de las mejores historias de los últimos años, personajes con carisma y jugabilidad buena
Los dlcs son pasables, de todos modos en oferta es compra obligada.

Una gran tematica que mescla de forma perfecta el diseño retro americano con lo mas abanzado de la tecnologia, un mundo que logra hechar a volar la imaginacion de cualquiera. Un juego mas que perecido para cualquier amante de los shooter sobre todo si saben apreciar una buena historia.

10\10 BioShock Infinite на 120% оправдывает покупку "сырой" BioShock: The Collection
Masterpiece уровня Half Life 3

游戏真的棒，伊丽莎白nb
神结局
生化奇兵经典一代，良心汉化。非常值得推荐，在天空之城翱翔空轨，贼鸡儿爽（脑补吧）。结局意外，良心队友小姐姐，伊丽莎白，能文能武。

Los que dicen que es una obra maestra se quedan pendejos con menos de 15 horas de juego suficiente como para pasarte el juego a la carrera y no saber mucho sobre la rica e increíble historia que ofrece y dejarse inundar en el universo caótico de Bioshock. Que este juego lo hace uno de los mejores de la década solo porque tiene un final complicado de entender e impactante la primera vez que lo juegas ya te hace pensar que es una obra maestra eso es mentira, porque lo que lo hace una obra maestra de este juego es cada detalle que dejas desapercibido en el ambiente y en la que poco a poco te hacen entender y valorar el maravilloso trabajo que hicieron los desarrolladores. 
[i]- 10/10 Totalmente recomendado.[/i]
Kinda like dishonored with more guns, 1000% rad
Forever loop, forever pain, and forever hope. One of the best FPS stories, you should never miss this game if you are a stroy lover and an FPS fan!
Шикарная игра!!!
Bellissimo gioco, più che consigliato.
good game lol

Pros:
-The story is interesting. The game does a great job of world building.
-The game looks great visually, very bright and crisp.
-The story runs smoothly. There are few moments where I'm saying "Why am I doing this?"; it has decent flow.
-Small jumpscares. I wouldn't classify this game as horror but there are a few jumpscare moments that keep me alert, which I enjoy.

Cons:
-Combat system could use some work. The indicators for hurting an enemy are really vague with only a barely visible health bar and faint blood. The most annoying part is that the combat system encourages you to swap weapons of the enemies you've killed often, because your bullet damage and ammo capacity is quite lacking even with upgrades. However a lot of the guns are quite awful and don't feel good shooting in the game's enviornment of enemies shooting at  all angles. 

I bought this game while it was on sale (I don't remember how much, maybe $10-15 USD) and having never played a previous bioshock game. For others looking to buy this game but are concerned that they won't be able to enjoy it without playing the previous two games, I would say that this game is very enjoyable without playing the previous two. It was relatively short (finished the main story in about 8 hours) which I don't mind but I know some people do. If it's on sale, I'd easily reccomend it unless you're not into first person shooters or plot driven games like this. If it's not on sale, I would say that if you're an avid fan of story driven first person shooters or an avid fan of the bioshock series, buy it, otherwise, wait for a sale.
这款游戏真心的好玩，伊丽莎白也是这游戏的一个重点，游戏画质已经很棒了，基本上很多地方都可以截图当壁纸，尤其是游戏刚开始不久，配置要求也不高，我gtx550ti1080p高特效稳定60fps，这个游戏值得入手，你买不了吃亏，嫌贵的就等打折买吧，注意自己的钱包哦
Wow what a great game. I've overlooked this game multiple times, I was stupid. Bought it for full price. Worth every penny. Gotta support the devs and everyone who involved making this game.

Legit mustardpiece

Hochachtungsvoll!
Leiste ich Abbitte dafür, dass ich dieses Spiel 4 Jahre lang ignoriert habe. Ich dachte, es sei ein hübscher Shooter. Zu leicht und kaum so mitreißend wie ein Call Of Duty oder ein Battlefield oder Crysis. Einmal angefangen konnte ich dieses Spiel nicht mehr aus dem Kopf bekommen: Diese Detailverliebtheit, diese Story, dieses Vereinnahmtwerden. 
Dies ist mehr als ein Spiel. Dies ist eine Geschichte, die zwar vieles offen läßt, die aber noch nach Ende des Spiels tagelang nachklingt und mich darüber nachdenken läßt, was denn nur passiert ist. Viel mehr als nur ein guter Shooter. 
Ich hoffe, meine Schuld ist getilgt.

Just one thing:

卢特斯这个人物太有意思了。

如果说这个游戏......哦，不，不能说是游戏,把他称为艺术品或许更好。他带给你的是第九艺术的冲击，还是剧情带来的感动，我觉得都是无可挑剔的。对于这个游戏我已经没办法做到一个玩家的客观评价了，所以这并非一个常规评测。而是对这个艺术品的一种膜拜。就如你站在一幅画前，身临其境，感受到爱恨纠葛，迷惑与绝望。也正如我曾经听说过有人在看蒙娜丽莎的时候会站在那里几个小时，但是醒来的时候却觉得只有几秒。这个艺术品也切实给了你这种体会，你会陷入其中，成为一位画中人，然后恍如隔世。

Waste of time...just stick to the first 2...this one muddles the story and honestly just dead a$$ ruins everything. It doesn't even make sense within its own logic it creates. They tried to shock you with twists but it was so shoehorned that it ruins it. Pass on this.
Great game! Played through the story mode twice because it was so much fun.

I managed to beat it on medium difficulty in only a few hours.

It's a wonderful journey, the art is amazing. The voice acting and animation is phenomenal.

Elizabeth is where the game shines, she's like a Disney princess but relatable and down to earth. This is definitely a step-up from the first two Bioshock games, in graphics, scope and storytelling. THe gameplay and shooting has also been refined to make a better experience.

At times, the game felt like it was dragging but in the end, it had some good twists and the ending makes me want to play the dlc!

Story is good.

Gameplay is "Tolerable."

Half of the weapons are good and half of the others try to be better but really only worse.

Sadly can only carry two weapons at a time.

My one complaint is that this game doesn't really have replayability for me. I only want to play it once.

I don't f ucking understand the ending. Like, why did what happen, even happen?

I give it a 6/10. The gameplay is tolerable enough to go through the story till end. Some enemies are annoyingly overpowered for being on just Normal mode and some enemies will not die even if you straight up headshot them. Oh, and there are like 8 abilities in this game and they're literally all trash except for really only 2 of them. 

6/10 is good enough for recommended review. If it was 5/10 I would not make a review. If it was below 5 I would right not recommended review.

Why is this so highly rated? "Overwhelmingly Positive" my  a s s .

DLC not bought.
Played it during the last christmas holidays and really enjoyed the story. Fantastic game.

First things first: "Infinite" has almost nothing to do with the first two "BioShock" adventures if not in "Burial at Sea".

This being stated... Guys, let me say that this is THE game!
It is so complete from every and any point of view - despite the plot may left you with some uncertainties and questions.

The gameplay is very intriguing and it contains basically all of the aspects a good product should have in my opinion: combats, love, mysteries, plot twists, a little bit of horror, extremely cool characters... Also, time warping!
You can't avoid getting fully immersed in this chapter.

The graphic is astounding: everything is extremely detailed and the colours are vibrant.
I have been having a few issues with the short films you find inside, such as the videos promoting and explaining the uses of Vigors, but otherwise I encountered no fluidity problem.

As usual: you won't be able to collect all of the achievements the first time, so keep on playing.

Totally recommended to anyone. And don't forget to download the DLCs, but just if you have played the original games, for they contain HUGE spoilers about the main story!
满分剧情
兹磁一下神作，虽然没玩过

总感觉卡卡的

Haven't tried the DLC, but this is a great game. Great story and well polished. Runs well at 4k,

Often overlooked, the final installment of the Bioshock series isn't so bad after all.
Bioshock Infinite strays from the dark and gritty theme that the last two entries had and replaces it with a bright and colorful atmosphere that's sure to get you hooked. 
Delve into the world of Columbia and explore the secrets of the life of protagonist Booker DeWitt, as you encounter a girl named Elizabeth and the face the terrors that lurk within her. 

A great first-person shooter with a decent leveling system that impacts your abilities in the game. Good character design, the world is beautifully crafted as well. Plotline is understandable but the execution may get a bit wonky towards the end, I wish they had done more to polish the writing. While it loses the dark and grim atmosphere the other Bioshock titles had it retains the thrill that's true to every title of the series. 

Great soundtrack, good voice acting, clean gameplay. I have not encountered any game-breaking bugs nor have I triggered anything that would cause the game to crash.
剧情上面可以说非常惊艳，游戏场景也制作的很用心，唯一的遗憾可能是正篇流程有点短，10个小时就通关了（含部分支线）

I would ONLY recommend this game if you can get it for 15$ or less, instead of 25 on sale that I got it.  Overall the game felt anemic, like funding was suddenly reduced and the team had to sew up what they had, but aside from that,


-equiptment gear sometimes doesn't really make sense (a pair of boots that make you aim better down the sights and worse when from the hip)

-there are a lot of non-violent NPCs around but you can't really talk to any of them

-the autosave format made wanting to take a break a real hassled marathon

-the skyline system is sometimes bothersomely restrictive due to plot, and sometimes glitchy (on the rail toward the Hall of Heroes I got stuck somehow between carts)

-invisible walls are not well masked

-I only played the game twice, but the choices available only made a single difference in the game, and that was that the couple from the fair gave me some gear.  it was super disappointing that the end seemed exactly the same.  But again, I only played the game twice and did all the opposite choices.  Ultimately it felt like the game's whole point was 'it doesn't matter what you do' at which point I just got annoyed since it felt like Elizabethe was just tricking Booker to kill himself when it shouldn't even matter because even if you make a bajillion Bookers choose to an hero instead of sell you to his alternate self or whatever there will still be an infinite number of Bookers that do so why don't you two just move on like Booker kept suggesting and just fly to Paris and get on with you lives?

-exploration of all available space did not seem rewarding enough

-vigours not as beleiveable a superpower set as the plasmids

-wall corners and boxes snag the player way too easily

-the '2 opposing and equally unjust factions' plotline of the previous two games could have benefitted from more subversion

-it's kind of lazy-seeming that there are vigour bottles that are actually just salt bottles

-although i sympathised with the scene where Elizabethe sings to that kid, it felt really one-note

-with Columbia going it alone I'd like to have heard a comment or seen something to explain where Columbia gets all its food aside from Fink's 'Comstock has to peddle his wares for the Earthly ores'.  But I do suppose how Rapture got its food isn't worried about either.

-it would have been nice if weapon upgrades had some modelling representation, but that too would be a little jarring when most of your weapons come from the dead, rather than a store.


+I did like however that Elizabethe's navigation was pretty intuitive
+and also that a couple of times the synchronisation of characters' lines was quite good
+the limit on the number and permanence of traps settable in an area was high enough to not seem restrictive at all
+I liked the detail that some clocks' minute hands were actually articulated along with the second hand
+Elizabethe's salt health and ammo tosses were a fair compromise for involuntary save points.  It did make the game feel a little too 'arcadey' at times but I'd be dog meat without the tosses at certain points.

10/10 THIS GAME IS FUCKING AWESOME


1000000/10 BEST GAME

Если вы читаете этот обзор, то скорее всего я уже мертв. Дорогой игрок, всеми силами богов Огня и Севера я заклинаю тебя НЕ заходить в эту игру. Пусть тебя не обманывают цветы, солнце и зелень. В конце пути ты познаешь тьму и дикий ужас. Эти куклы, они следят за мной, а ЕЁ голос зовет меня из каждый звезды, из каждого лучика света. "Задушить гаденыша, пока он не родился"-эти слова она не умолкают в моей голове. Пройдя эту игру, вы скорее всего сойдете с ума, от количества альтернативных реальностей и всей глубины сюжета, возможно даже, как и я, вы выпрыгните в окно. Раз уж тебе хватило безумия зайти сюда, то знай же и запомни навсегда-"Каждый маяк-это дверь, а дверей милиарды милиардов". А так же никогда не доверяй тому, что видят твои глаза, и тому, что слышат твои уши. Весь этот ЭКСПЕРИМЕНТ в конечном итоге обернется против тебя. Черт возьми, чуть не забыл-Бойся, бойся БЛИЗНЕЦОВ, ОНИ все время следят за тобой, ОНИ всегда здесь, даже когда ты об этом не знаешь!

Nothing to say other than it is, by far, one of my most favorite games EVER. The story, the twists, the gameplay, every single detail that goes into this game is perfection. I regret never giving the Bioshock series a chance before, because holy crap, this game just ripped my soul straight out of my body, curb stomped it, ripped it into tiny pieces, and force fed them back to me. 10/10, would recieve crippling emotional distrust again.
